data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The music festival last weekend was canceled. It ____ supposed ____ be ____ in Grant Park, but ____ was ____ much ____. If ____ had ____ it ____, ____ audience ____ have ____ completely ____ after ____ minutes. Instead, they will try to have the festival later this summer.
data.partBlankContent: The music festival last weekend was canceled. It w__ supposed t_ be he__ in Grant Park, but th___ was t__ much ra__. If th__ had he__ it any___, t__ audience wo___ have be__ completely w__ after t__ minutes. Instead, they will try to have the festival later this summer.
data.fullContent: The music festival last weekend was canceled. It was supposed to be held in Grant Park, but there was too much rain. If they had held it anyway, the audience would have been completely wet after the minutes. Instead, they will try to have the festival later this summer.
data.answer: 上周末的音乐节被取消了。按计划，应该在格兰特公园举行，但雨太大了。如果他们举行音乐节，几分钟后观众们就会被完全淋湿。代替取消的音乐节，他们将试着在今年夏天晚些时候举办音乐节。
